description: A list of non-dental facilities (equipment is not included in this data set) in Illinois that currently possess radiation producing equipment.  There is a separate data set that includes the dental facilities with radiation producing equipment.

metadata.description: A list of non-dental facilities (equipment is not included in this data set) in Illinois that currently possess radiation producing equipment.  There is a separate data set that includes the dental facilities with radiation producing equipment.

name: IEMA Non-Dental Facilities in Illinois with Radiation Producing Equipment
